thread.title: Ogallala football team halts Mitchell’s win streak

author: DANIEL BEENEY Sports Reporter
title: Ogallala football team halts Mitchell’s win streak
text:
Ogallala football team halts Mitchell’s win streak 
Mitchell's Christian Perez runs during a football game against Ogallala on Friday. Ogallala football team halts Mitchell’s win streak By DANIEL BEENEY Sports Reporter Star Herald 
MITCHELL — Coming off a strong win against Chadron last week, Mitchell hoped to extend its three-game win streak Friday against Ogallala. 
However, a powerful defense and a consistently aggressive offense helped Ogallala shut down the Tigers 33-17.   Remember me on this computer Login   Subscription required
